price: ߝߋߙߊߥߎ߲߫ ߣߴߊ߬ ߢߍߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߰ߦߟߍߡߊ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wajāa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi-ati
